turnOnSync.subtitle: Turn on Ledger Sync to continue
turnOnSync.text: This is required to be able to fetch you accounts securely. By clicking Turn on Ledger Sync youâ€™ll be redirected to Ledger Live to activate the feature.

success.description: You transaction will be processed soon.

error.title: Transaction failed
error.description: There was an error signing your transaction. Please try again.

DeviceNotSupported.cta2: Upgrade to a new Ledger Device with 20% off
